author: Theo Salaun
title: NFL Free Agents 2020: Latest on Cam Newton, More Top Free Agents
description: While Cam Newton does not have a new home yet, the rest of free agency has hummed along with major additions among various position groups. Of those groups, the most notable movement is happening along the defensive line and secondary...
content:
Tony Avelar/Associated Press
